issue.title: [C++] Consider using fast-double-parser
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10328](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10328). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We use Google's double-conversion library for parsing strings to doubles. We should consider using this library, which is more than 2x faster.
https://github.com/lemire/fast_double_parser

Parsing doubles is important for CSV performance.
